name: A Hunter's Tale - Rowan Reed
description:
Desperate for a catch, a hunter answers a mysterious call coming from the dark forest of Adria and encounters a strange phenomenon.

This short kinetic story is tied to Rowan Reed, my previous game. It's made with the Belle engine. 

Hit escape(esc) to save and don't hesitate to point out any bug to me. 

Support my work on Patreon
